docs.title: 👋 Hi, I'm Ankit Kumar
docs.text: Welcome to my personal website — a space where I share what I learn, build, and experiment with across software engineering, cloud, and data systems.

docs.title: 🚀 About Me
docs.text:
I'm a Senior Member of Technical Staff currently working at Oracle Health, and based in Bengaluru, India. My experience spans:

  • Building and scaling microservices (Spring Boot, Java, JAX-RS, Helidon)
  • Working with distributed data systems (Spark, Hadoop, HBase, Avro, Parquet)
  • DevOps & Cloud (OCI, AWS, GCP — Compute, DB, Load Balancing, Storage)
  • Authentication & Authorization systems (Keycloak, OAuth, IAM)
  • Schema management (Avro, Hortonworks Schema Registry, JPA/Hibernate)
  • Building migration and integration pipelines across cloud platforms

I enjoy solving complex distributed-system problems, optimizing performance, and simplifying infrastructure setups.

docs.title: ✍️ What You'll Find Here
docs.text:
I use this space to document:

  • 🔧 Engineering deep-dives
  • 🧪 Proof-of-concepts and experiments
  • 🗃 Data engineering patterns and setups
  • ☁️ Cloud architecture notes (OCI, AWS, GCP)
  • 🧩 Practical guides, tips, and troubleshooting
  • 💡 Thoughts on engineering, optimization, and design

If you're a backend, data, or cloud engineer, you'll probably find something useful.
